entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Winnipeg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:42 a.m. CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 70%
